TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Marshal extends System.Object
public ref class Marshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供方法的集合，方法用於配置 Unmanaged 記憶體、複製 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊和將 Managed 類型轉換為 Unmanaged 類型，也包括其他和 Unmanaged 程式碼互動時使用的方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of methods for allocating unmanaged memory, copying unmanaged memory blocks, and converting managed to unmanaged types, as well as other miscellaneous methods used when interacting with unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `static`方法上定義類別是使用 unmanaged 程式碼的基本措施。The `static` methods defined on the class are essential to working with unmanaged code. 這個類別中定義的大部分方法通常供開發人員想要提供 managed 與 unmanaged 程式設計模型之間的橋樑。Most methods defined in this class are typically used by developers who want to provide a bridge between the managed and unmanaged programming models. 例如，方法將 ANSI 字元從指定的字串 （在受管理的堆積） 複製到未受管理的堆積中的緩衝區。For example, the method copies ANSI characters from a specified string (in the managed heap) to a buffer in the unmanaged heap. 它還會配置目標堆積是正確的大小。It also allocates the target heap of the right size. Common language runtime 提供特定的封送處理功能。The common language runtime provides specific marshaling capabilities. 如需封送處理行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[Interop 封送處理](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md)。For details on marshaling behavior, see [Interop Marshaling](~/docs/framework/interop/interop-marshaling.md). `Read`和`Write`方法類別支援對齊和未配置的存取。The `Read` and `Write` methods in the class support both aligned and unaligned access. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用各種方法所定義類別。The following example shows how to use various methods defined by the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Marshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用語言執行平台管理 COM 物件的參考計數，讓您使其不必直接使用這個方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 在少數情況下，例如測試自訂封送處理器，您可能會覺得必須以手動操作物件的存留期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 在呼叫，您必須使用像是方法的參考計數遞減。After calling , you must decrement the reference count by using a method such as . 請勿依賴的傳回值，如有時可能不穩定。Do not rely on the return value of , as it can sometimes be unstable. 您可以呼叫， ，或取得值，表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面指標。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents an [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer. 您也可以使用這些方法和上取得 managed 的物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式所代表的 COM 介面的 managed 物件的方法。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to obtain the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's COM callable wrapper. 如果您不熟悉此包裝函式類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。If you are not familiar with the details of this wrapper type, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是兩個記憶體配置的其中一個應用程式開發介面中的方法類別。 is one of two memory allocation API methods in the class. (是另。)傳回的初始記憶體內容會是未定義，並配置的記憶體可能會大於要求的位元組數目。( is the other.) The initial memory content returned is undefined, and the allocated memory can be larger than the requested number of bytes. 這個方法會公開 COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626)函式，指 COM 工作記憶體配置器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148626) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是中的兩個記憶體配置方法的其中一個類別。 is one of two memory allocation methods in the class. (是另。)這個方法會公開 Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628)函式，從 Kernel32.dll。( is the other.) This method exposes the Win32 [LocalAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148628) function from Kernel32.dll. 當呼叫`LocalAlloc`，它會傳遞`LMEM_FIXED`旗標，這會導致鎖定就地配置的記憶體。When calls `LocalAlloc`, it passes a `LMEM_FIXED` flag, which causes the allocated memory to be locked in place. 此外，配置的記憶體不是零填滿。Also, the allocated memory is not zero-filled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#4)]

span.span: if there are any RCWs available for cleanup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有很多可能需要很長的時間，以清除所有物件的深入相依性圖形的 managed 和原生程式碼之間的參考。If there are a lot of references between managed and native code with deep dependency graphs it can take a long time for all the objects to clean up. 每次 GC 執行它將會釋出一些 Rcw，接著就會釋放基礎 COM 物件。Each time a GC runs it will free up some number of RCWs, which will in turn release the underlying COM objects. 這些 COM 物件接著釋放其受管理的參考，並讓更多的物件可供清除在下一次 GC 執行時，用來啟動處理程序透過一次。Those COM objects will then release their managed references and make more objects available for cleanup the next time a GC runs, which starts the process over again. 方法可讓應用程式，判斷多少循環的 GC。收集與 GC。WaitForPendingFinalizers 需要發生以清除所有項目。The method provides a way for the application to determine how many cycles of GC.Collect and GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers need to happen in order to clean everything up.

summary.span: 通知執行階段清除配置在目前內容中的所有[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW)。

span.span: Notifies the runtime to clean up all [Runtime Callable Wrappers](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCWs) allocated in the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它會嘗試清除 Rcw 時，interop 系統激發訊息。The interop system pumps messages while it attempts to clean up RCWs. 這可確保的清除作業的所有應用程式，包括不會被提取通常足以的應用程式中發生的單一執行緒 apartment (STA) Rcw。This ensures that cleanup for single-threaded apartment (STA) RCWs happens in all applications, including applications that do not pump often enough. 不過，某些應用程式會適當地幫浦執行都非常容易幫浦作業發生的位置。However, some applications that do pump appropriately are very sensitive to where pumping occurs. 當 interop 系統激發訊息，這些應用程式，在未預期，位置中，應用程式可能發生的重新進入的問題很難診斷。When the interop system pumps messages in these applications, in places that are unexpected, , the application can encounter reentrancy issues that are difficult to diagnose. 因此，應用程式需要能夠控制自己幫浦作業的特定 STA，並且控制清除的 Rcw。Therefore, applications need to be able to control their own pumping for a particular STA and to control the clean-up of RCWs. 不過，開發人員通常只能控制他們的應用程式中執行緒的子集，而且無法確保會適當地提取所有執行緒。However, developers often only control a subset of the threads in their application and thus cannot ensure that all threads are pumping appropriately. 若要解決此問題：To solve this problem: 1. 使用方法，以關閉 自動清除 Rcw 和發生時，每個執行緒為基礎的訊息幫浦作業。Use the method to turn off automatic cleanup of RCWs, and the message pumping that occurs, on a per-thread basis. 這可讓開發人員可以選擇不自動清除和對應的訊息幫浦作業。This allows developers to opt out of automatic clean-up, and the corresponding message pumping. 2. 使用方法來通知執行階段，以清除所有配置的目前內容中的 Rcw。Use the method to notify the runtime to clean up all RCWs that are allocated in the current context. 這個小幫手方法可讓開發人員執行階段會在目前內容中執行清除時，精確地控制。This companion method allows developers to precisely control when the runtime performs cleanup in the current context.

summary.span: 從 Unmanaged 記憶體指標將資料複製到 Managed 8 位元不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer) 陣列。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 8-bit unsigned integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unmanaged，c-style 陣列未包含界限的詳細資訊，如此可防止`startIndex`和`length`從要驗證的參數。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，若要對應的 unmanaged 的資料`source`參數填入受管理的陣列，不論它的實用性。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the `source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 呼叫這個方法之前，您必須初始化 managed 的陣列具有適當的大小。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下列範例會將陣列複製到 unmanaged 記憶體，並再複製回 managed 記憶體的 unmanaged 的陣列。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-byte/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從 Unmanaged 記憶體指標將資料複製到 Managed 64 位元帶正負號的整數陣列。

span.span: Copies data from an unmanaged memory pointer to a managed 64-bit signed integer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unmanaged，c-style 陣列未包含界限的詳細資訊，如此可防止`startIndex`和`length`從要驗證的參數。Unmanaged, C-style arrays do not contain bounds information, which prevents the `startIndex` and `length` parameters from being validated. 因此，若要對應的 unmanaged 的資料`source`參數填入受管理的陣列，不論它的實用性。Thus, the unmanaged data corresponding to the`source` parameter populates the managed array regardless of its usefulness. 呼叫這個方法之前，您必須初始化 managed 的陣列具有適當的大小。You must initialize the managed array with the appropriate size before calling this method. ## Examples 下列範例會將陣列複製到 unmanaged 記憶體，並再複製回 managed 記憶體的 unmanaged 的陣列。The following example copies an array to unmanaged memory and then copies the unmanaged array back to managed memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-int64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-int64/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-int64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy-int64/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將某個 COM 類別類型轉換，通常的基底`__ComObject`類型，而另一個 COM 類別類型。 converts one COM class type, typically the base `__ComObject` type, to another COM class type. 輸入的 COM 物件，由參數代表`o`，是[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)。The input COM object, represented by parameter `o`, is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW). 同時`t`和`o`參數必須是的類別與屬性會設定其簽章。Both the `t` and `o` parameters must be classes whose signatures are attributed with . [Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具會套用這個屬性讓您匯入類型程式庫時。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 如果在原始程式碼中手動建立 RCW 時，您應該套用此屬性代表以表示其 COM 來源的原始 coclass 的 managed 簽章。If you create the RCW manually in source code, you should apply this attribute to the managed signature that represents the original coclass to signify its COM origins. Tlbimp.exe 匯入 COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582)做為受管理的類別和介面。Tlbimp.exe imports a COM [coclass](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/333d0904-ffa2-4d25-878d-7422bcd40582) as a managed class and an interface. Coclass 介面已經在原始的 coclass 名稱相同，而且 managed 的類別的程式原始的 coclass 名稱加上 「 類別 」。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". Coclass 的呼叫，例如`MyCoclass`會變成在 coclass 介面稱為`MyCoclass`和受管理的類別稱為 「 `MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 因為`t`必須是類別，而不是介面，請確認指定的 managed 的類別 (`MyCoclassClass`) 和 coclass 介面。Since `t` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the coclass interface. > [!NOTE] > 遺失的身分識別的 COM 物件，因為新的 RCW 執行個體包裝輸入[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)原始 RCW 所公開的指標。You lose the identity of the input COM object because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

Coclass 介面已經在原始的 coclass 名稱相同，而且 managed 的類別的程式原始的 coclass 名稱加上 「 類別 」。The coclass interface has the same name as the original coclass, and the managed class has the original coclass name appended with "Class". Coclass 的呼叫，例如`MyCoclass`會變成在 coclass 介面稱為`MyCoclass`和受管理的類別稱為 「 `MyCoclassClass`。For example, a coclass called `MyCoclass` becomes a coclass interface called `MyCoclass` and a managed class called `MyCoclassClass`. 因為`T`必須是類別，而不是介面，請確認指定的 managed 的類別 (`MyCoclassClass`) 而非`coclass`介面。Because`T` must be a class, not an interface, be sure to specify the managed class (`MyCoclassClass`) and not the `coclass` interface. > [!NOTE] > 因為新的 RCW 執行個體包裝，遺失之輸入的 COM 物件，識別[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)原始 RCW 所公開的指標。You lose the identity of the input COM object, because a new RCW instance wraps the [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) pointer exposed by the original RCW.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法以釋放參考類型的欄位，例如字串的 unmanaged 結構。You can use this method to free reference-type fields, such as strings, of an unmanaged structure. 不同於其欄位中，結構可以是實值類型或參考型別。Unlike its fields, a structure can be a value type or a reference type. 實值類型的結構，其中包含實值類型欄位 (所有 blittable) 有任何必須釋放其記憶體的參考。Value-type structures that contain value-type fields (all blittable) have no references whose memory must be freed. 方法會使用這個方法來避免記憶體流失時重複使用的結構所佔用的記憶體。The method uses this method to prevent memory leaks when reusing memory occupied by a structure. 呼叫 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633)函式，其亦會釋放已配置的字串。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148633) function, which, in turn, frees an allocated string. 除了、類別提供兩種其他記憶體解除配置方法：和。In addition to , the class provides two other memory-deallocation methods: and .

summary.span: 藉由將[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的參考計數設定為 0，釋放對 RCW 的所有參考。

span.span: Releases all references to a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) by setting its reference count to 0.

returns.span: 與 參數建立關聯的 RCW 之參考計數的新值；如果釋放成功，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with the parameter, which is 0 (zero) if the release is successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會釋放 COM 物件的 managed 的參考。The method releases the managed reference to a COM object. 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫迴圈，直到傳回 0 （零） 中的方法。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method in a loop until it returns 0 (zero). 當 COM 物件上的參考計數變成 0 時，COM 物件是通常釋出，雖然這取決於 COM 物件的實作，已超出控制項的執行階段。When the reference count on the COM object becomes 0, the COM object is usually freed, although this depends on the COM object's implementation and is beyond the control of the runtime. 不過，RCW 可以仍然存在，等候進行記憶體回收。However, the RCW can still exist, waiting to be garbage-collected. 具有已經從其基礎 RCW 分離後，就無法使用 COM 物件。The COM object cannot be used after it has been separated from its underlying RCW. 如果您嘗試在 RCW 上呼叫的方法，其參考計數變成 0 之後,就會擲回。If you try to call a method on the RCW after its reference count becomes 0, a will be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像和，您可以使用這個方法來取消配置記憶體。Like and , you can use this method to deallocate memory. 呼叫 COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633)函式，這樣會釋放由任何下列未受管理的方法所配置的記憶體： `SysAllocString`， `SysAllocStringByteLen`， `SysAllocStringLen`， `SysReAllocString`， `SysReAllocStringLen`。 calls the COM [SysFreeString](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148633) function, which frees memory allocated by any of the following unmanaged methods: `SysAllocString`, `SysAllocStringByteLen`, `SysAllocStringLen`, `SysReAllocString`, `SysReAllocStringLen`. 例如，這些平台叫用，您可以呼叫 unmanaged 的方法。You can call unmanaged methods such as these with platform invoke. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For details, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md).

[!code-cpp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/cpp/marshal.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/CS/Marshal.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Marshal#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Marshal/VB/Marshal.vb#4)] 下列範例示範如何將轉換的 managed 內容寫入 unmanaged 記憶體中的類別，然後再處置時完成的 unmanaged 記憶體。The following example demonstrates how to convert the contents of a managed class to unmanaged memory and then dispose of the unmanaged memory when done. remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) OLEAUT32 從函式。DLL;不過，後者必須要有類別識別項 (CLSID) 而不是程式設計識別項 (`ProgID`) 必須是由這個方法。 exposes the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function from OLEAUT32.DLL; however, the latter expects a class identifier (CLSID) instead of the programmatic identifier (`ProgID`) expected by this method. 若要取得沒有已註冊的 COM 物件的執行個體`ProgID`，使用平台叫用來定義 COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函式。To obtain a running instance of a COM object without a registered `ProgID`, use platform invoke to define the COM [GetActiveObject](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221467\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 如需說明的平台叫用，請參閱[使用 Unmanaged DLL 函式](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For a description of platform invoke, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). ## ProgID 和 CLSIDProgID and CLSID 登錄的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT 子樹狀目錄中的索引鍵包含各種子機碼的類型。Keys in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT subtree of the registry contain a variety of subkey types. 大部分的子機碼會將使用者易記的字串對應至 CLSID 的 Progid。Most of the subkeys are ProgIDs, which map a user-friendly string to a CLSID. 應用程式通常使用這些人類看得懂的字串，而不是數字的 Clsid。Applications often use these human-readable strings instead of the numeric CLSIDs. 通常，元件會有對應至最新版本的系統上已安裝的元件版本無關的 ProgID。Often, a component has a version-independent ProgID that is mapped to the latest version of the component that is installed on the system. 應用程式和元件主要使用 Progid 來擷取其對應的 Clsid。Applications and components primarily use ProgIDs to retrieve their corresponding CLSIDs. ## Examples 下列範例以 Microsoft Word 的執行個體設定的電腦上執行。The following example was run on a computer that was configured with a running instance of Microsoft Word. 沒有 Microsoft Excel 執行的任何執行個體。There were no instances of Microsoft Excel running. 範例會呼叫兩次。The example calls twice. 第一次呼叫會嘗試擷取的 Microsoft Word 執行個體的參考 (執行個體`Word.Application`物件)。The first call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word (an instance of the `Word.Application` object). 第二個呼叫會嘗試擷取的 Microsoft Excel 執行個體的參考 (執行個體`Excel.Application`物件)。The second call tries to retrieve a reference to an instance of Microsoft Excel (an instance of an `Excel.Application` object). 程式碼已成功擷取到的 Microsoft Word 執行個體的參考。The code retrieves a reference to an instance of Microsoft Word successfully. 不過，因為未執行 Microsoft Excel，嘗試擷取第二個物件引發。However, because Microsoft Excel is not running, the attempt to retrieve the second object raises a . [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/cs/marshal.getactiveobject.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetActiveObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.marshal.getactiveobject/vb/marshal.getactiveobject.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回代表指定的物件上所要求的介面的介面指標。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the requested interface on the specified object. 如果您有未受管理的方法，必須要有傳遞的介面指標，就會特別有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 呼叫此方法的物件會導致遞增的介面指標上之前會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您必須遵守使用原始 COM 介面指標時，COM 所定義的規則。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 當呼叫的方法會公開為 COM 物件參數時相當實用型別，或使用自訂封送處理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 雖然較不常見，您可以使用這個方法的 managed 物件上，取得物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式的指標。Although less common, you can use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper. 例如，您可以使用managed 物件匯出至 COM，若要取得的介面指標上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 您無法取得類別介面的指標，因為類別介面缺少對應的型別，要傳遞給第二個參數 (`t`)。You cannot obtain a pointer to a class interface since a class interface lacks the corresponding type to pass to the second parameter (`t`). 請改用叫用 COM 可呼叫包裝函式，這通常是自動分派類別介面的預設介面上的成員。Instead, use to invoke the members on the default interface of the COM callable wrapper, which is usually an auto-dispatch class interface. 方法多載可讓預設的查詢介面自訂。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要套用查詢介面自訂，請使用方法多載。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回介面指標，表示`TInterface`介面上指定的物件。This method returns an interface pointer that represents the `TInterface` interface on the specified object. 如果您有未受管理的方法，必須要有傳遞的介面指標，就會特別有用。It is particularly useful if you have an unmanaged method that expects to be passed an interface pointer. 呼叫此方法的物件會導致遞增的介面指標上之前會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用方法以遞減參考計數，當您完成將指標。Always use the method to decrement the reference count when you have finished with the pointer. 您必須遵守使用原始 COM 介面指標時，COM 所定義的規則。You must adhere to the rules defined by COM when using raw COM interface pointers. 當呼叫的方法會公開為 COM 物件參數時相當實用型別，或使用自訂封送處理。 is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 您也可以使用這個方法的 managed 物件上以取得物件的 COM 可呼叫包裝函式的指標雖然這是較不常見。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain a pointer to the object's COM callable wrapper, although this is less common. 例如，您可以使用managed 物件匯出至 COM，若要取得的介面指標上。For example, you can use on a managed object that is exported to COM to obtain an interface pointer for . 方法多載可讓預設的查詢介面自訂。The method overload allows query interface customization by default. 若要指定是否要套用查詢介面自訂，請使用方法多載。To specify whether to apply query interface customization, use the method overload. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)，[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，和[類別介面簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)主題。For additional information, see the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md), [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), and [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024) topics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法帳戶所傳回的三個的以零為起始的插槽號碼[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)或可能是四個[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使第一個可用插槽的值是 3 或 7。The zero-based slot number returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . 您可以使用這個方法不會顯示從 COM 介面的成員和成員的私用介面擷取插槽編號。You can use this method to retrieve slot numbers for members of interfaces that are not visible from COM and for members of private interfaces. 傳回的插槽編號對應至 v 資料表數字，會保留，如果型別已公開至 com。The slot numbers returned correspond to the v-table numbers that would be reserved if the type was exposed to COM. COM 隱藏成員實際佔用公開 v 資料表中的位置，即使 COM 用戶端無法使用的位置。COM-invisible members actually occupy a slot in an exposed v-table, even though the COM client cannot use the slot. 您無法使用藉由傳遞的類別介面上自的類別。You cannot use on a class interface by passing from a class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在版本的.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，無法將函式指標，表示 unmanaged 程式碼的 managed 的方法的委派，可讓 unmanaged 程式碼呼叫受管理的方法，透過函式指標傳遞。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, it was possible to pass a delegate representing a managed method to unmanaged code as a function pointer, allowing the unmanaged code to call the managed method through the function pointer. 伺服器也可以傳遞至 managed 程式碼，該函式指標的 unmanaged 程式碼和指標已正確地解析為基礎的 managed 方法。It was also possible for the unmanaged code to pass that function pointer back to the managed code, and the pointer was resolved properly to the underlying managed method. 在.NET Framework 2.0 和更新版本中，您可以使用和方法來封送處理兩個方向的委派。In the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, you can use the and methods to marshal delegates in both directions. 與，`ptr`匯入為。With , `ptr` is imported as a . A可以藉由呼叫的 managed 委派取得以及傳遞做為參數，它便可以呼叫從 unmanaged 方法內。A can be obtained for a managed delegate by calling and passed as a parameter; it can then be called from inside the unmanaged method. 請注意，參數封送處理器可以也封送處理.NET Framework 2.0 和更新版本中的委派函式指標。Note that the parameter marshaler can also marshal function pointers to delegates in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions. 方法具有下列限制：The method has the following restrictions: - Interop 案例中不支援泛型。Generics are not supported in interop scenarios. - 您無法將無效的函式指標傳遞給這個方法。You cannot pass an invalid function pointer to this method. - 您可以使用這個方法僅適用於純 unmanaged 函式指標。You can use this method only for pure unmanaged function pointers. - 您無法使用此方法，以透過 c + + 或從取得的函式指標方法。You cannot use this method with function pointers obtained through C++ or from the method. - 您無法使用這個方法來建立委派從函式指標，另一部受管理的委派。You cannot use this method to create a delegate from a function pointer to another managed delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回以零起始，v 資料表數目的介面或類別。This method returns the zero-based, v-table number for an interface or a class. 類別上使用時，傳回的插槽編號會參考類別的類別介面。When used on a class, the slot number returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果自動雙重類別介面，這個方法一律會傳回 – 1，表示僅分派介面不會公開 managed 用戶端 v 資料表。If the class interface is auto-dual, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 您可以使用和搭配傳遞指定的範圍內的位置。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來取得根據 HRESULT，而不必呼叫方法和 catch （因此避免相對應的效能額外負荷） 的例外狀況。Use the method to get an based on an HRESULT without having to call the method and catch the exception (thus avoiding the corresponding performance overhead). `errorInfo`參數提供其他錯誤，例如其文字描述，以及定義錯誤之介面的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID) 的相關資訊。The `errorInfo` parameter supplies additional information about the error, such as its textual description and the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the interface that defined the error. 如果您的自訂錯誤您不必在轉換中提供的資訊，請使用這個方法多載。Use this method overload if you have custom error information that you have to supply in the conversion. 每一個 hresult 為其比較例外狀況類別，.NET Framework 中的對應，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派`d`轉換成可以傳遞至 unmanaged 程式碼使用的函式指標[__stdcall](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8)呼叫慣例。The delegate `d` is converted to a function pointer that can be passed to unmanaged code using the [__stdcall](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e212594b-1827-4d07-9527-7d412b300df8) calling convention. 您以手動方式必須保留委派中所收集的記憶體回收行程，從 managed 程式碼。You must manually keep the delegate from being collected by the garbage collector from managed code. 記憶體回收行程不會追蹤 unmanaged 程式碼的參考。The garbage collector does not track references to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 也可以設定[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)例外狀況，可以藉由呼叫 COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID 函式取得的介面。 also sets up an [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface for the exception that can be obtained by calling the COM GetErrorInfoNEEDGUID function. 您可以使用此函式傳回 HRESULT 值上，您套用的 COM 介面的 managed 的類別實作屬性。You can use this function to return an HRESULT value on a managed class implementation of a COM interface where you apply the attribute. 屬性化的方法攔截所有例外狀況，並使用方法以傳回適當的 HRESULT 值。Have the attributed method catch all exceptions and use the method to return the appropriate HRESULT value. 允許例外狀況傳播方法之外，會產生不正確的行為。Allowing an exception to propagate outside the method produces incorrect behavior. （事實上，common language runtime 無法將例外狀況傳遞至呼叫 v 資料表透過這種方法的 COM 用戶端。）(In fact, the common language runtime fails to pass an exception to a COM client that calls such a method through a v-table.) 請注意，方法會設定[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method sets the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread. 針對方法類似，這可能會造成非預期的結果預設使用的方法[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)目前執行緒，如果設定。This can cause unexpected results for methods like the methods that default to using the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) of the current thread if it is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目標函式必須有`setLastError`中繼資料旗標集。The target function must have had the `setLastError` metadata flag set. 例如，`SetLastError`欄位必須`true`。For example, the `SetLastError` field of the must be `true`. 設定此旗標的程序取決於所使用的來源語言： C# 和 c + + 是`false`根據預設，但`Declare`陳述式在 Visual Basic 中的是`true`。The process for setting this flag depends on the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取對應至 Win32 錯誤程式碼使用的 HRESULT方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an HRESULT corresponding to a Win32 error code using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 managed 程式碼，您很少使用直接`IDispatch`介面。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IDispatch` interface. 不過，時呼叫的方法會公開為 COM 物件參數很有用型別，或使用自訂封送處理。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 呼叫此方法的物件會導致遞增的介面指標上之前會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 您也可以使用受管理的物件上的這個方法來取得 COM 可呼叫包裝函式物件的介面指標。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the COM callable wrapper for the object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。For additional information, see [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 managed 程式碼，您很少使用直接`IUnknown`介面。In managed code, you seldom work directly with the `IUnknown` interface. 不過，時呼叫的方法會公開為 COM 物件參數很有用型別，或使用自訂封送處理。However, is useful when calling a method that exposes a COM object parameter as an type, or with custom marshaling. 呼叫此方法的物件會導致遞增的介面指標上之前會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 這個方法提供的功能相反方法。This method provides the opposite functionality of the method. 您也可以使用受管理的物件上這個方法，若要取得的介面指標[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)物件。You can also use this method on a managed object to obtain an interface pointer to the [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) for the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面的 managed 的物件使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface for a managed object using the method. summary.span: 傳回使用平台叫用 (已設定 旗標) 來呼叫的最後 Unmanaged 函式所傳回的錯誤碼。

span.span: Returns the error code returned by the last unmanaged function that was called using platform invoke that has the flag set.

returns.span: 藉由呼叫 Win32 [SetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148656) 函式設定的最後錯誤碼。

span.span: The last error code set by a call to the Win32 [SetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148656) function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開 Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657)函式，從 Kernel32.DLL。 exposes the Win32 [GetLastError](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148657) function from Kernel32.DLL. 這個方法存在，因為它不是安全地進行直接的平台叫用呼叫`GetLastError`來取得這項資訊。This method exists because it is not safe to make a direct platform invoke call to `GetLastError` to obtain this information. 如果您想要存取此錯誤的程式碼，您必須呼叫反而比撰寫您自己的平台叫用定義`GetLastError`然後呼叫該元件。If you want to access this error code, you must call instead of writing your own platform invoke definition for `GetLastError` and calling it. Common language runtime 可以進行內部覆寫的 Api 呼叫`GetLastError`維護的作業系統。The common language runtime can make internal calls to APIs that overwrite the `GetLastError` maintained by the operating system. 您可以使用這個方法來取得錯誤的程式碼，只有當您套用至方法簽章，並將欄位設為`true`。You can use this method to obtain error codes only if you apply the to the method signature and set the field to`true`. 這個程序有所不同使用原始碼語言： C# 和 c + + 是`false`根據預設，但`Declare`陳述式在 Visual Basic 中的是`true`。The process for this varies depending upon the source language used: C# and C++ are `false` by default, but the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫 方法。The following example demonstrates calling the method. 此範例首先會示範如何呼叫的方法不出現錯誤，然後示範如何呼叫的方法，出現錯誤。The example first demonstrates calling the method with no error present and then demonstrates calling the method with an error present. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的值可能是， ，或物件。The return value may be a , , or object. 傳回的值取決於給定的 COM 介面槽中已有 managed 成員的型別 (因此的一般化的傳回型別所有三個衍生)。The return value depends on the type of managed member that exists in the given COM slot (hence the generalized return type from which all three derive). 這個方法所傳回的以零為起始的插槽號碼的三個帳戶[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)或可能是四個[IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)方法，使第一個可用插槽的值是 3 或 7。The zero-based slot number that is returned by this method accounts for three [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) and possibly four [IDispatch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5) methods, making the value of the first available slot either 3 or 7. 提供的功能相反。 provides the opposite functionality of . 您可以使用和搭配傳遞指定的範圍內的位置。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. `memberType`參數，請務必只在傳回時。The `memberType` parameter is important only on return. 它包含的型別對應所傳回的 COM 成員 （一般方法或屬性存取子）物件。It contains the type of the COM member (a regular method or a property accessor) that corresponds to the returned object.

.method public static hidebysig object GetObjectForIUnknown(native int pUnk) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetObjectForIUnknown (pUnk As IntPtr) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetObjectForIUnknown(IntPtr pUnk);

param.name: pUnk
param.span: 介面的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the interface.

summary.span: 傳回類型的執行個體，這個執行個體透過 [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) 介面指標來表示 COM 物件。

span.span: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface.

returns.span: 表示指定之 Unmanaged COM 物件的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會包裝`IUnknown`中受管理的物件。This method wraps `IUnknown` in a managed object. 這有遞增參考計數之 COM 元件的效果。This has the effect of incrementing the reference count of the COM component. 執行階段會在受管理物件，表示 COM 物件上執行記憶體回收時，參考計數會遞減。The reference count will be decremented when the runtime performs garbage collection on the managed object that represents the COM object. `pUnk`參數代表`IUnknown`介面指標; 不過，因為所有的 COM 介面直接或間接衍生自`IUnknown`，您可以將任何 COM 介面傳遞至這個方法。The `pUnk` parameter represents an `IUnknown` interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 所傳回的物件是[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)，common language runtime 負責管理，因為它沒有任何其他 managed 的物件。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object. 這個包裝函式的型別通常是基底`System.__ComObject`類型，這是隱藏的類型包裝函式類型模稜兩可時使用。The type of this wrapper is often a base `System.__ComObject` type, which is a hidden type used when the wrapper type is ambiguous. 您仍然可以進行晚期繫結呼叫基底類型，只要 COM 物件實作[IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85))介面。You can still make late-bound calls to such a base type as long as the COM object implements the [IDispatch](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5(vs.85)) interface. 同樣地，您可以轉型為適當的 COM 介面傳回的物件。Likewise, you can cast the returned object to an appropriate COM interface. 要包裝的物件與特定的 managed 的類別類型 （不是泛型包裝函式的型別），您必須遵守下列需求：For an object to be wrapped with a specific managed class type (and not a generic wrapper type), you must adhere to the following requirements: - 實作[IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) COM 物件的介面。Implement the [IProvideClassInfo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=148012) interface for the COM object. - 登錄包含組件與[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。Register the containing assembly with the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md). 或者，您可以避免這些需求，並使用會包裝與特定的 managed 的類別類型的物件仍可以獲得方法。Alternatively, you can avoid these requirements and still get an object that is wrapped with a specific managed class type by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回以零為起始的資料表 v 數目的介面或類別。This method returns the zero-based v-table number for an interface or a class. 類別上使用時，會傳回的插槽號碼是指類別的類別介面。When used on a class, the slot number that is returned refers to the class interface for the class. 如果自動分派類別介面，這個方法一律會傳回 – 1，表示僅分派介面不會公開 managed 用戶端 v 資料表。If the class interface is auto-dispatch, this method always returns -1 to indicate that the dispatch-only interface does not expose a v-table to managed clients. 您可以使用和搭配傳遞指定的範圍內的位置。You can use and in conjunction with to pass slots within a specified range. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類別介面簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024)。For additional information, see [Introducing the Class Interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/733c0dd2-12e5-46e6-8de1-39d5b25df024).

param.name: pUnk
param.span: Unmanaged 物件的 介面指標。

param.span: 要求之 Managed 類別的類型。

summary.span: 傳回表示 COM 物件之指定類型的 Managed 物件。

span.span: Returns a managed object of a specified type that represents a COM object.

returns.span: 對應於 物件 (代表要求的 Unmanaged COM 物件) 的類別執行個體。

span.span: An instance of the class corresponding to the object that represents the requested unmanaged COM object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `t`參數必須是 COM 匯入的類型或 COM 匯入類型的子類型。The `t` parameter must be either a COM-imported type or a subtype of a COM-imported type. 此外，`t`必須是的類型，而其中繼資料已匯入[Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具。In addition, `t` must be a type whose metadata was imported by the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool. 此類型必須是類別和不相關聯的 coclass 介面，不僅會包含 COM 類別的名稱。This type must be a class and not an associated coclass interface, which carries the name of the COM class. 比方說，如果 Tlbimp.exe 匯入`Myclass`為一種類別稱為`MyclassClass`，而且為 coclass 介面呼叫`Myclass`，您必須使用`MyclassClass`(不`Myclass`) 使用此方法。For example, if Tlbimp.exe imports `Myclass` as a class called `MyclassClass` and as a coclass interface called `Myclass`, you must use `MyclassClass` (not `Myclass`) with this method. 如需有關匯入的類別和介面，coclass 的詳細資訊，請參閱[匯入類型轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3)。For additional information about imported classes and coclass interfaces, see [Imported Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3). 如果物件具有已取得`pUnk`參數，`t`會被忽略，而且會傳回現有的物件。If an object has already been obtained for the `pUnk` parameter, `t` is ignored and the existing object is returned. `pUnk` 代表[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)介面指標; 不過，因為所有的 COM 介面直接或間接衍生自`IUnknown`，您可以將任何 COM 介面傳遞至這個方法。`pUnk` represents an[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer; however, because all COM interfaces derive directly or indirectly from `IUnknown`, you can pass any COM interface to this method. 所傳回的物件是[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md)(RCW)，common language runtime 負責管理，因為它沒有任何其他 managed 的物件。The object returned by is a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW), which the common language runtime manages as it does any other managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當組件匯出至類型程式庫時，類型程式庫會指派 LIBID。When assemblies are exported to type libraries, the type library is assigned a LIBID. 您可以藉由套用，明確地設定 LIBID在組件層級，或它可以自動產生。You can set the LIBID explicitly by applying the at the assembly level, or it can be generated automatically. [Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具計算 LIBID 值根據組件識別。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool calculates a LIBID value based on the identity of the assembly. 傳回相關聯的 LIBID ，如果已套用該屬性。 returns the LIBID that is associated with the , if the attribute is applied. 否則，傳回導出的值。Otherwise, returns the calculated value. 或者，您可以使用方法，以從現有的類型程式庫擷取實際的 LIBID。Alternatively, you can use the method to extract the actual LIBID from an existing type library. 請參閱[匯出組件轉換](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3fffd8db-240f-4fde-a558-a5bcc01e1a86)主題，如需有關文件庫識別項。See the [Exported Assembly Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3fffd8db-240f-4fde-a558-a5bcc01e1a86) topic for more information about library identifiers.

[Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具會套用這個屬性讓您匯入類型程式庫時。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool applies this attribute for you when it imports a type library. 兩個其他方法也會決定指定的物件是否表示 COM 物件，但傳回的需求`true`從這個方法的需求不同。Two other methods also determine whether a specified object represents a COM object, but the requirements for returning `true` differ from this method's requirements. 傳回`true`類別 （或介面） 以屬性直接; 它不會傳回`true`的衍生型別。 returns `true` if the class (or interface) is attributed with directly; it does not return `true` for derived types. 傳回`true`如果類型以屬性或衍生自具有相同 GUID 的類型。 returns `true` if the type is attributed with or derives from a type with the same GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回代表 unmanaged 記憶體中的方法簽章的參數所需的堆疊大小 （以位元組為單位）。The method returns the stack size (in bytes) needed to represent the parameters of a method signature in unmanaged memory. 請注意，這個方法的傳回值的平台而異。Note that the return value of this method is platform-dependent. 比方說，並且以單一整數參數的簽章會傳回 32 位元平台和值為 8，64 位元平台上的值為 4。For example, a signature with a single integer parameter returns a value of 4 on 32-bit platforms and a value of 8 on 64-bit platforms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供 unmanaged 的結構版面配置，不一定對應到 managed 的結構配置位移方面的位移。 provides the offset in terms of the unmanaged structure layout, which does not necessarily correspond to the offset of the managed structure layout. 封送處理結構可以轉換配置，並變更位移。Marshaling the structure can transform the layout and alter the offset. `t`參數可以是實值類型或格式化的參考類型 （有可能是循序或明確配置）。The `t` parameter can be a value type or a formatted reference type (with either a sequential or explicit layout). 您可以使用，以取得整個版面配置的大小方法。You can obtain the size of the entire layout by using the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設的實值類型封送處理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d9a876c-e05a-40ba-bd85-bd22877f984a)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Value Types](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d9a876c-e05a-40ba-bd85-bd22877f984a). > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 2.0 版中，從可能會公開私用欄位。Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, may expose private fields.

span.span: Executes one-time method setup tasks without calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定工作提供早期的初始化和目標方法叫用時自動執行。Setup tasks provide early initialization and are performed automatically when the target method is invoked. 第一次的工作包括下列各項：First-time tasks include the following: - 正在驗證平台叫用的中繼資料已正確地格式化。Verifying that the platform invoke metadata is correctly formatted. - 正在驗證所有受管理的類型是否有效的參數，平台叫用函式。Verifying that all the managed types are valid parameters of platform invoke functions. - 正在尋找和載入處理序的 unmanaged 的 DLL。Locating and loading the unmanaged DLL into the process. - 處理序中尋找的進入點。Locating the entry point in the process. 呼叫方法以外的平台上叫用沒有任何作用。Calling on a method outside of platform invoke has no effect. 若要執行安裝程式工作在所有平台叫用方法在類型中，使用。To execute setup tasks on all platform invoke methods in a type, use .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會公開[iunknown:: Queryinterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) COM 物件，會嘗試取得特定的介面指標的方法。The method exposes the [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method of a COM object, which attempts to obtain a specific interface pointer. 使用`QueryInterface`在 COM 物件會在 managed 程式碼中執行轉型作業相同。Using `QueryInterface` on a COM object is the same as performing a cast operation in managed code. 呼叫此方法的物件會導致遞增的介面指標上之前會傳回指標的參考計數。Calling an object with this method causes the reference count to increment on the interface pointer before the pointer is returned. 一律使用遞減參考計數，一旦完成指標。Always use to decrement the reference count once you have finished with the pointer. 若要取得值，表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)的介面指標，您可以呼叫， ，或。To obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer, you can call , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有隱含的位移為 0。 has an implied offset of 0. 這個方法可讓 unmanaged C 樣式位元組陣列，因而不複製整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用的直接互動 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，再讀取其項目值。This method enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before reading its element values. 支援讀取未配置的記憶體位置。Reading from unaligned memory locations is supported. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊、 寫入一個位元組到 unmanaged 記憶體、 從 unmanaged 記憶體、 讀取位元組，然後處置 unmanaged 的記憶體。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用方法讀取的未受管理的字元值。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to read the value of an unmanaged character. [!code-cpp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是中的兩個記憶體配置方法的其中一個類別。 is one of two memory reallocation methods in the class. (是另。)重新配置的記憶體內容的開頭是相同的原始內容。不過，整個記憶體區塊都可以在不同的位置。( is the other.) The beginning of the reallocated memory content is the same as the original content; however, the entire memory block can be in a different location. 這個方法會公開 COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778)函式，指 COM 工作記憶體配置器。This method exposes the COM [CoTaskMemRealloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148778) function, which is referred to as the COM task memory allocator.

(是另。)( is the other.) 這個方法會公開 Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780)函式，從 Kernel32.dll。This method exposes the Win32 [GlobalReAlloc](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148780) function from Kernel32.dll. 傳回的指標可能與原始版本不同。The returned pointer can differ from the original. 如果不同，原始記憶體區塊的內容已複製到新的區塊，並釋出原始記憶體區塊。If it is different, the contents of the original memory block have been copied to the new block, and the original memory block has been freed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通用語言執行平台管理 COM 物件的參考計數，讓您使其不必直接使用這個方法。The common language runtime manages the reference count of a COM object for you, making it unnecessary to use this method directly. 使用此值僅供測試用途。Use this value only for testing purposes. 在少數情況下，例如測試自訂封送處理器，您可能會覺得必須以手動操作物件的存留期。In rare cases, such as testing a custom marshaler, you might find it necessary to manipulate an object's lifetime manually. 只有程式該呼叫應該呼叫。Only programs that call should call . 呼叫之後參考計數達到零會造成未定義的行為。Calling after the reference count has reached zero causes undefined behavior. 您可以呼叫， ，或取得值，表示[IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003)釋放的介面指標。You can call , , or to obtain an value that represents a [IUnknown](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=148003) interface pointer to release. 您也可以使用這些方法和方法釋放的 managed 物件所代表的 COM 介面的 managed 物件上[COM 可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)。You can also use these methods and the method on managed objects to release the COM interfaces represented by the managed object's [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取`IUnknown`介面的 managed 的物件使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an `IUnknown` interface for a managed object using the method. 然後藉由呼叫釋放的介面指標的範例方法。The example then releases the interface pointer by calling the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetIUnknownForObject-release/vb/example.vb#1)]

public: static int ReleaseComObject(System::Object ^ o);

param.name: o
param.span: 要釋放的 COM 物件。

span.span: The COM object to release.

summary.span: 遞減與指定 COM 物件建立關聯之[執行階段可呼叫包裝函式](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) 的參考計數。

span.span: Decrements the reference count of the [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW) associated with the specified COM object.

returns.span: 與 關聯的 RCW 之參考計數的新值。

span.span: The new value of the reference count of the RCW associated with .

returns.span: 這個值通常為零，因為不論呼叫的 Managed 用戶端數目，RCW 只保留一個包裝的 COM 物件參考。

span.span: This value is typically zero since the RCW keeps just one reference to the wrapped COM object regardless of the number of managed clients calling it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來明確控制從 managed 程式碼使用的 COM 物件的存留期。This method is used to explicitly control the lifetime of a COM object used from managed code. 您應該使用這個方法以釋放保留資源的參考，及時或以特定順序，必須釋放物件的基礎 COM 物件。You should use this method to free the underlying COM object that holds references to resources in a timely manner or when objects must be freed in a specific order. 每次 COM 介面指標輸入 common language runtime (CLR)，它會包裝在 RCW。Every time a COM interface pointer enters the common language runtime (CLR), it is wrapped in an RCW. RCW 有每當 COM 介面指標，會對應到它就會遞增參考計數。The RCW has a reference count that is incremented every time a COM interface pointer is mapped to it. 方法遞減參考計數的 RCW。The method decrements the reference count of an RCW. 執行階段在參考計數達到零時，釋放 unmanaged 的 COM 物件上的所有其參考，並擲回如果您嘗試以進一步使用的物件。When the reference count reaches zero, the runtime releases all its references on the unmanaged COM object, and throws a if you attempt to use the object further. 如果相同的 COM 介面傳遞一次以上從 unmanaged 到 managed 程式碼，包裝函式上的參考計數會遞增每個階段中，並且呼叫傳回剩餘參考的數目。If the same COM interface is passed more than one time from unmanaged to managed code, the reference count on the wrapper is incremented every time, and calling returns the number of remaining references. 這個方法可讓您強制的 RCW 參考計數的版本，如此它就會發生精確當您想要。This method enables you to force an RCW reference count release so that it occurs precisely when you want it to. 不過，不當使用可能會導致應用程式失敗，或可能會造成存取違規。However, improper use of may cause your application to fail, or may cause an access violation. 假設應用程式定義域中的 managed 程式碼會抓代表 COM 元件的 RCW。Consider a scenario in which managed code in an application domain is holding onto an RCW that represents a COM component. 如果您呼叫在 RCW 上的方法，managed 程式碼將無法存取 RCW，將會引發例外狀況。If you call the method on the RCW, the managed code will be unable to access the RCW and will raise an exception. 如果發行 RCW 時，RCW 呼叫正在執行，可能會發生更嚴重的錯誤。A more serious error may occur if a call to the RCW is executing when the RCW is released. 在此情況下，是很好的機會進行呼叫的執行緒會造成存取違規。In this case, there is a good chance that the thread making the call will cause an access violation. 不過，處理序記憶體可能已損毀，而且在程序可以繼續執行直到它失敗原因將會很難偵錯。However, process memory may become corrupted, and the process may continue to run until it fails for reasons that are very difficult to debug. 這項風險就會更加惡化時所使用的 COM 元件是單一值，原因如下： CLR 啟動 COM 元件，藉由呼叫 COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894)函式會傳回相同的介面指標每個針對單一 COM 元件會呼叫的時間。This risk is compounded when the COM component that is being used is a singleton, for the following reason: The CLR activates COM components by calling the COM [CoCreateInstance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=142894) function, which returns the same interface pointer every time it is called for singleton COM components. 因此，個別且獨立應用程式定義域中的 managed 程式碼片段可以使用相同的 RCW 單一 COM 元件，而且如果有任一個一個呼叫COM 元件上的方法，另會中斷。Thus, separate and independent pieces of managed code in an application domain can be using the same RCW for a singleton COM component, and if either one calls the method on the COM component, the other will be broken. 因此，使用只有在絕對必要。Therefore, use the only if it is absolutely required. 如果您想要呼叫這個方法，以確保在決定階段釋放 COM 元件，請考慮使用方法改為。If you want to call this method to ensure that a COM component is released at a determined time, consider using the method instead. 會釋放基礎 COM 元件，不論它已經重新進入 CLR 的次數。 will release the underlying COM component regardless of how many times it has re-entered the CLR. 內部的參考計數的 RCW 都會加一每次 COM 元件重新進入 CLR。The internal reference count of the RCW is incremented by one every time the COM component re-enters the CLR. 因此，您可以呼叫方法中的迴圈，直到傳回的值為零。Therefore, you could call the method in a loop until the value returned is zero. 這可達到相同結果方法。This achieves the same result as the method.

.method public static hidebysig void StructureToPtr(object structure, native int ptr, bool fDeleteOld) cil managed
Public Shared Sub StructureToPtr (structure As Object, ptr As IntPtr, fDeleteOld As Boolean)
public: static void StructureToPtr(System::Object ^ structure, IntPtr ptr, bool fDeleteOld);

param.name: structure
param.span: 存有要封送處理之資料的 Managed 物件。

span.span: A managed object that holds the data to be marshaled.

param.span: 這個物件必須是格式化類別的結構或執行個體。

span.span: This object must be a structure or an instance of a formatted class.

param.name: ptr
param.span: Unmanaged 記憶體區塊的指標，這記憶體必須在呼叫這個方法之前被配置。

span.span: A pointer to an unmanaged block of memory, which must be allocated before this method is called.

param.name: fDeleteOld
param.span: 表示在此方法複製資料之前，在 ptr 參數上呼叫 方法。

span.span: to call the method on the ptr parameter before this method copies the data.

param.span: 區塊必須包含有效的資料。

span.span: The block must contain valid data.

param.span: 請注意，當記憶體區塊已經包含資料時傳遞 會造成記憶體流失。

span.span: Note that passing when the memory block already contains data can lead to a memory leak.

summary.span: 從 Managed 物件封送處理資料到 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`structure`是實值類型，會進行 boxed 處理或進行 unboxed 處理。If `structure` is a value type, it can be boxed or unboxed. 如果會進行 boxed 處理，它會 unboxed 複製之前。If it is boxed, it is unboxed before copying. 格式化的類別是參考類型所指定的配置屬性，為或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 複製的內容`structure`預先配置的記憶體區塊，`ptr`參數所指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`包含參考類型封送處理至 COM 介面指標 (介面，沒有版面配置的類別和)，以參考計數會保持運作的受管理的物件。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他參考類型 （例如，字串和陣列） 會封送處理複本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要釋放這些 managed 或 unmanaged 物件，您必須呼叫方法之前，您釋出記憶體區塊。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果您使用方法，以將不同的執行個體複製到記憶體區塊，在稍後的時間，指定`true`如`fDeleteOld`移除參考計數在前一個執行個體的參考型別。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否則，會有效地遺漏 managed 的參考 typesand unmanaged 複本。Otherwise, the managed reference typesand unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 使用的整體模式如下所示：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在第一個呼叫方法後已配置的記憶體區塊，`fDeleteOld`必須`false`，因為沒有任何要清除的內容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`如`fDeleteOld`只有區塊包含有效的資料。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果您將不同的執行個體複製到記憶體區塊，而且物件包含參考類型`fDeleteOld`必須`true`釋放舊的內容中的參考型別。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果物件包含參考類型，您必須呼叫方法之前，您釋出記憶體區塊。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要釘選而不要複製現有的結構，請使用要建立結構的固定控制代碼類型。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 如需如何釘選的詳細資訊，請參閱[複製和 Pin](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立受管理的結構、 將它傳送到 unmanaged 的記憶體使用方法，然後再傳送回 managed 的記憶體使用方法。The following example creates a managed structure, transfers it to unmanaged memory using the method, and then transfers it back to managed memory using the method. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure-SizeOf/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從指定類型的 Managed 物件封送處理資料到 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊。

span.span: Marshals data from a managed object of a specified type to an unmanaged block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的類別是參考類型所指定的配置屬性，為或。A formatted class is a reference type whose layout is specified by the attribute, as either or . 複製的內容`structure`預先配置的記憶體區塊，`ptr`參數所指向。 copies the contents of `structure` to the pre-allocated block of memory that the `ptr` parameter points to. 如果`structure`包含參考類型封送處理至 COM 介面指標 (介面，沒有版面配置的類別和)，以參考計數會保持運作的受管理的物件。If `structure` contains reference types that marshal to COM interface pointers (interfaces, classes without layout, and ), the managed objects are kept alive with reference counts. 所有其他參考類型 （例如，字串和陣列） 會封送處理複本。All other reference types (for example, strings and arrays) are marshaled to copies. 若要釋放這些 managed 或 unmanaged 物件，您必須呼叫方法之前，您釋出記憶體區塊。To release these managed or unmanaged objects, you must call the method before you free the memory block. 如果您使用方法，以將不同的執行個體複製到記憶體區塊，在稍後的時間，指定`true`如`fDeleteOld`移除參考計數在前一個執行個體的參考型別。If you use the method to copy a different instance to the memory block at a later time, specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` to remove reference counts for reference types in the previous instance. 否則，未受管理的複本與受管理的參考類型會有效地遺漏。Otherwise, the managed reference types and unmanaged copies are effectively leaked. 使用的整體模式如下所示：The overall pattern for using is as follows: 1. 在第一個呼叫方法後已配置的記憶體區塊，`fDeleteOld`必須`false`，因為沒有任何要清除的內容。On the first call to the method after a memory block has been allocated, `fDeleteOld` must be `false`, because there are no contents to clear. > [!IMPORTANT] > 指定`true`如`fDeleteOld`只有區塊包含有效的資料。Specify `true` for `fDeleteOld` only if the block contains valid data. 2. 如果您將不同的執行個體複製到記憶體區塊，而且物件包含參考類型`fDeleteOld`必須`true`釋放舊的內容中的參考型別。If you copy a different instance to the memory block, and the object contains reference types, `fDeleteOld` must be `true` to free reference types in the old contents. 3. 如果物件包含參考類型，您必須呼叫方法之前，您釋出記憶體區塊。If the object contains reference types, you must call the method before you free the memory block. > [!NOTE] > 若要釘選而不要複製現有的結構，請使用要建立結構的固定控制代碼類型。To pin an existing structure instead of copying it, use the type to create a pinned handle for the structure. 如需如何釘選的詳細資訊，請參閱[複製和 Pin](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md)。For details on how to pin, see [Copying and Pinning](~/docs/framework/interop/copying-and-pinning.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ThrowExceptionForHR (int errorCode);
.method public static hidebysig void ThrowExceptionForHR(int32 errorCode) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ThrowExceptionForHR (errorCode As Integer)
public: static void ThrowExceptionForHR(int errorCode);

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 對應於希望的例外狀況的 HRESULT。

span.span: The HRESULT corresponding to the desired exception.

summary.span: 擲回具有特定錯誤 HRESULT 值的例外狀況。

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的失敗 HRESULT 的例外狀況物件。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 為 0 或正值 （成功碼），則方法會傳回而無須建立或擲回例外狀況。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 請注意，方法會傳回根據例外狀況[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)若已設定目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 當發生這種情況時，`errorCode`參數已忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失敗的 Hresult 對應定義的例外狀況，而有些則不用。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 對應至已定義的例外狀況，建立例外狀況的執行個體，它就會擲回。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否則，它會建立的執行個體、 初始化以 HRESULT 的錯誤代碼欄位，並擲回該例外狀況。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. 當是叫用，它會嘗試使用未受擷取錯誤的相關額外資訊[GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx)函式。When is invoked, it attempts to retrieve extra information regarding the error by using the unmanaged [GetErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221032\(v=vs.85\).aspx) function. 每一個 hresult 為其比較例外狀況類別，.NET Framework 中的對應，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md). 有時候，可能會從先前的 COM 呼叫傳回例外狀況。Occasionally, might return an exception from a previous COM call. 在此情況下，您可以使用下列因應措施，並傳遞`IntPtr(-1)`做為第二個參數 (`errorInfo`):In this case, you can use the following workaround and pass `IntPtr(-1)` as the second parameter (`errorInfo`): ``` [SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.LinkDemand, Flags = SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode)] public static void ThrowExceptionForHR(interrorCode,IntPtrerrorInfo) ```

span.span: Throws an exception with a specific failure HRESULT, based on the specified [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立指定的失敗 HRESULT 的例外狀況物件。This method creates an exception object for the specified failure HRESULT. 如果 HRESULT 為 0 或正值 （成功碼），則方法會傳回而無須建立或擲回例外狀況。If the HRESULT is 0 or positive (a success code), the method returns without creating or throwing an exception. 方法會釋放`errorInfo`參數，減少 COM 參考計數[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)介面。The method releases the `errorInfo` parameter, decreasing the COM reference count of the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface. 請注意，方法會傳回根據例外狀況[IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx)若已設定目前執行緒的介面。Note that the method returns an exception based on the [IErrorInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms221233\(v=vs.85\).aspx) interface of the current thread if one is set. 當發生這種情況時，`errorCode`參數已忽略。When this happens, the `errorCode` parameter is ignored. 某些失敗的 Hresult 對應定義的例外狀況，而有些則不用。Some failure HRESULTs map to defined exceptions, whereas others do not. 如果 HRESULT 對應至已定義的例外狀況，建立例外狀況的執行個體，它就會擲回。If the HRESULT maps to a defined exception, creates an instance of the exception and throws it. 否則，它會建立的執行個體、 初始化以 HRESULT 的錯誤代碼欄位，並擲回該例外狀況。Otherwise, it creates an instance of , initializes the error code field with the HRESULT, and throws that exception. `errorInfo`參數用來擷取錯誤的相關額外資訊。The `errorInfo` parameter is used to retrieve extra information regarding the error. 每一個 hresult 為其比較例外狀況類別，.NET Framework 中的對應，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For the mapping from each HRESULT to its comparable exception class in the .NET Framework, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您直接互動 unmanaged C 樣式位元組陣列，因而不複製整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，才能設定其項目值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊、 寫入一個位元組到 unmanaged 記憶體、 從 unmanaged 記憶體、 讀取位元組，然後處置 unmanaged 的記憶體。The following example creates a block of unmanaged memory, writes a byte to the unmanaged memory, reads the byte back from unmanaged memory, and then disposes the unmanaged memory. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.ReadByte - WriteByte/vb/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您直接互動 unmanaged C 樣式位元組陣列，因而不複製整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，才能設定其項目值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged C-style byte array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您直接互動的 unmanaged 64 位元帶正負號陣列，因而不複製整個的 unmanaged 的陣列的費用 (使用) 到個別的 managed 陣列，才能設定其項目值。 enables direct interaction with an unmanaged 64-bit signed array, eliminating the expense of copying an entire unmanaged array (using ) to a separate managed array before setting its element values. 支援寫入未配置的記憶體位置。Writing to unaligned memory locations is supported. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何讀取和寫入的 unmanaged 的陣列使用和方法。The following example demonstrates how to read and write to an unmanaged array using the and methods.
